name: Yale Wired Outdoor Dome Camera HD1080
descr: The Yale Full HD1080p Dome Camera is an accessory for the Yale Smart Home CCTV range, allowing you to view and record live footage from your property. The camera records around the clock with 30m enhanced night vison and is suitable for outdoor use.

name: 2000W Ceramic Tower Heater
descr: This tower heater has a distinctive and stylish retro look, with its front grill and attractive rose gold trim. Featuring 2 heat settings, it's the perfect solution for heating up smaller rooms.

name: Valor Baltimore 12KW Solid Fuel Stove
descr: A large double-door traditional style, cast iron multi-fuel stove; for burning wood or solid fuel to produce a real fire.

name: Dimplex Stockbridge 2kW Electric Stove
descr: The Dimplex Stockbridge is an authentic, cast iron styled electric stove, an ideal alternative to traditional wood burning/solid fuel stove. Completing the look, the Stockbridge has opening doors finishing off its realistic appearance.  Electric fires are easy to operate as there is little or no installation required. There is no annual maintenance required as with gas and they are 100 per cent efficient at point of use.

name: Mansion Traditional Fire Grate
descr: Cast iron fire grate to fit 40cm aperture fireplace.

name: 10 Litre Dehumidifier
descr: Compact, powerful, and efficient, the Moretti 10 litre Dehumidifier allows you to control excess moisture, preventing mould and mildew from developing and creating a fresh-smelling, clean environment throughout your home.

name: Dimplex Courchevel 2kW Electric Stove
descr: The Courchevel is a mid-sized cast-iron style electric stove, with its controls discreetly concealed behind its opening door. Adding to its authenticity the stove uses the realistic Optiflame log effect with the illusion of 'dying embers'- which can still be notice when the fire is switched off. The flame effect can be used independently of heat which makes it suitable for use all year round.

name: Scandia Exuro 5 Stove
descr: The Exuro V (5kW) stove is a contemporary design with extended viewing glass that retains the focal point of the room while minimalist controls both above and within the lower door provide the primary and secondary air controls to enable complete and effective control over both burn rate and temperature output. Defra and HETAS approved for use in Smoke Control Areas. This stove has a firebrick lined firebox, a removable ash pan for ease of maintenance, premium impact resistant glass as well as a "clearview" glass airwash system.

name: Adam Hudson Electric Stove - Black
descr: With its textured black finish, the Hudson is an electric stove with a difference. This traditionally styled stove has an air of elegance about it, which allows it to fit into both classically and contemporarily styled interiors.

name: Dimplex Springbourne 2kW Electric Stove
descr: The Springborne is a 2kW traditionally styled freestanding electric stove coming complete with a real coal fuel bed and a remote control. The compact stove has been designed to fit in or stand on a standard fireplace and hearth. What's great about the Springborne is its opening door, which complements the stoves authenticity and traditional design.

name: Scandia Ardeo 7 Stove
descr: The Ardeo VII (7kW) stove is the largest in the Ardeo range, forged in traditional cast iron with a distinct touch of contemporary styling this 7kW stove will effectively heat living spaces up to 98 cubic metres. It is Defra and HETAS approved for use in Smoke Control Areas. This stove has a firebrick lined firebox, a removable ash pan for ease of maintenance, premium impact resistant glass as well as a "clearview" glass airwash system.

name: Dimplex Club 2kW Electric Stove
descr: The Dimplex 2 kW Club electric fire is an ideal alternative to a traditional wood burning/solid fuel stove. This electric stove has a choice of heat settings allowing you to have complete control on how much warmth you require, also coming with a remote control gives even more accessibility, so you can change settings with ease.

name: Dimplex Gosford 2kW Opti-myst Electric Stove
descr: A classic black freestanding stove featuring a 3D realistic flame effect; the perfect blend of tradition and innovation and will be a perfect statement feature in any home.

name: £100 Homebase Gift Card
descr: Give a gift card for even more choice.  Whether someone you know is a keen gardener, a DIY enthusiast or simply looking to invest in their home, our gift cards will be perfectly suited. Each card is blank so you can add your own personal message.

name: £30 Homebase Gift Card
descr: Give a gift card for even more choice.  Whether someone you know is a keen gardener, a DIY enthusiast or simply looking to invest in their home, our gift cards will be perfectly suited. Each card is blank so you can add your own personal message.

name: Duchess Top Companion Set - 5pc
descr: This Duchess Top Companion Set complete with Stand, Poker, Shovel, Tongs and Brush provides all the necessary tools needed when creating the perfect fire to relax besides.

name: Dimplex Brayford 2kW Electric Stove
descr: The Brayford is an elegant and traditionally styled 2 kW electric stove, an ideal alternative to traditional wood burning/solid fuel stoves. The Brayford features a choice of heat settings, log effect fuel bed and the realistic moving flame effect Optiflame. It can be operated with or without heat, making it ideal for use all year round. The Brayford has a remote control so you can switch it on/off from a distance. The Brayford has BEAB Intertek approval for added safety assurance.

name: Adam Woodhouse Electric Stove - Black
descr: With its black finish, the Woodhouse is an electric stove with a difference. This traditionally styled stove has an air of elegance about it, which allows it to fit into both classically and contemporarily styled interiors.

name: Scandia Black Companion Set
descr: Forged from steel The Jet Black Fire Tool Set is durable and robust and would complement any contemporary range of wood fires

name: Scandia 2 Fold Fire Grate
descr: This sturdy fire safety screen will minimise the risk of coming into contact with what can be extremely hot surfaces. Suits most mid-size wood fires.

name: Dimplex Castillo Electric Freestanding Fire - 2kW
descr: The Dimplex 2 kW Castillo freestanding electric fire is designed to be used freestanding flat against a wall. It is supplied assembled so it is very easy to set up. The Castillo has an elegant and contemporary look, finished in satin silver with chrome effect fret and trims. The fire has a choice of 2 heat settings (1 kW or 2 kW) for a greater control over your room temperature, and comes with a choice of a real coal or white pebble fuel bed, both of which are included.

name: Dimplex Bayport 2KW Opti-myst Stove
descr: A classic black freestanding stove featuring a 3D realistic flame effect; the perfect blend of tradition and innovation and will be a perfect statement feature in any home.

name: Scandia Contour Companion Set
descr: The Scandia Glass Base and Stainless Fire Tool Set is the perfect accessory for any contemporary wood fired home.

name: Scandia Round 760 Wood Storage
descr: The Round 750 is a beautifully designed wood storage solution and the ideal choice to complement any wood fire. The round 750 is equipped with 3 various compartments, one large area for storing logs and larger wood pieces, a smaller compartment for kindling, matches or paper.

name: Hire Evaporative Cooler 240V - 1 Day
descr: This Evaporative Cooler is all you need to keep your living/office environment comfortable in the warmer summer months. Loaded with user-friendly features: Honeycomb cooling media for optimum cooling. A user friendly touch control panel and angled viewing LCD display. 0.5 to 8 hours OFF timer. A detachable water tank and a low water alarm. Adjustable humidification level and oscillating louver. A top loading ice compartment.

name: Glenmore Electric Suite
descr: The Glenmore electric suite in Soft white painted finish has a grand presence guaranteed to grace any room in your home. A real audience pleaser, this traditional styled suite comes complete with soft under mantel lighting to create the perfect ambient background glow whilst showcasing the inset fire below. A realistic coal bed with smouldering embers and dancing flames delivers an outstanding performance. Teamed with the accompanying heavenly warmth the Glenmore is the perfect addition to your home.

name: Grey Barrel Pendant Light
descr: Capiz shells in a barrel shape.

name: Aviemore Black Electric Stove
descr: The Adam Aviemore is an electric stove with a difference, with it's textured black, haughty colour, this traditionally styled stove has an air of elegance about it, which allows it to fit into both classically and contemporary interiors. The real magic begins when you switch the fire on and are enveloped by the simmering glow of the realistic LED flame effect - perfect for long, cosy evenings. A modern iteration of a traditional design, use this stylish stove to update your home.

name: Aviemore White Electric Stove
descr: The Adam Aviemore is an electric stove with a difference, with it's smooth white colour, this traditionally styled stove has an air of elegance about it, which allows it to fit into both classically and contemporary interiors. The real magic begins when you switch the fire on and are enveloped by the simmering glow of the realistic LED flame effect - perfect for long, cosy evenings. A modern iteration of a traditional design, use this stylish stove to update your home.

name: Dimplex Chevalier 2kW Electric Stove
descr: The Dimplex Chevalier is an authentic, cast iron styled electric stove, an ideal alternative to traditional wood burning/solid fuel stove. Completing the look, the Chevalier has opening doors finishing off its realistic appearance. Electric fires are easy to operate as there is little or no installation required.

name: 1800W Electric Stove
descr: This Electric Stove has a reassuring traditional design, with realistic smouldering coal effect.  It has two heat settings, adjustable thermostat and overheat protection for safety.

name: Antique Pewter Coal Bucket
descr: This pewter fireplace coal bucket is not only a necessary fireside accessory, but with a classic, timeless design it also looks great too. Use this set to ensure your coal or logs are stored dry and safe.

name: Karcher Rotary Wash Brush
descr: The Karcher WB 100 rotating wash brush is perfect for cleaning all smooth surfaces, e.g. paint, glass or plastic. This wash brush comes with a number of features allowing for a superior clean with the minimum of effort: rotating bristles with gentle cleaning action, 180 degree infinitely adjustable joint on handle for cleaning difficult to reach areas , infinitely adjustable speed and detergent dosing, easy to change brush attachment, outer protector ring for protection against scratches and union nut for secure gun connection. This brush is suitable for all Karcher K2 and K7 series pressure washers making it a great addition to your outdoor cleaning kit.

name: Be Modern Vitesse Inset Electric Fire - Chrome

descr: The Karcher wheel wash brush has all-round bristles which ensures extremely effective cleaning. This brush reaches all those difficult to reach areas and gets into the smallest of gaps for thoroughly clean wheels and wheel rims. The Karcher wheel wash brush has the added benefit of uniform 360 degree water distribution for dissolving and flushing away the dirt. The quality bristles provide a gentle but efficient cleaning action, for excellent all-round cleaning results. This brush includes a union nut for a secure spray gun connection and ergonomic handle for ease of use. The Karcher wheel washing brush is a great addition to your Karcher pressure washer, suitable for all K2-K7 models.

descr: Using state of the art Opti-myst Technology, a realistic flame effect that is difficult to distinguish from the real thing, complimented with a beautiful white textured surround and concealed heater.

name: Colorado Black Electric Fire
descr: If it's a sturdy, modern electric fire you're after, few are as versatile as the Adam Colorado. With its black trim and fret, this is a stylish fire that will make your interior positively simmer with style. The fire features an atmospheric bed of glowing coals which work alongside the LED flames to give a smoulderingly realistic flame effect.

name: Adam Oxford Electric Stove Suite
descr: This contemporary Adam Oxford Electric Stove Suite is sure to add a touch of sophistication and style to your living space. The contrasting pure white surround and black back panel and hearth are the perfect backdrop for the double doored stove in the centre whilst the realistic LED flames make you feel warm and cosy as you unwind beside it.

name: Ryobi 500w Jigsaw Kit 16 Blades RJS720-GA16
descr: The Ryobi 500W Jigsaw is a great all round solution for cutting straight lines and curves in a wide variety of materials. From cutting laminate flooring to kitchen sink cutouts in worktops this will have you covered! Now you can grab yourself a bargain, this kit now includes 16 blades!

name: Yucca - 24cm
descr: Agavaceae Yuccas are stylish, easy-to-care-for house plants that look great in any room.

name: Comet Electric Fire
descr: The Adam Comet is a versatile fire whose bright brushed steel trim and fret will make your interior positively simmer with style. The fire features an atmospheric pebble bed that works alongside the realistic LED flame effect to give a smoulderingly convincing fire. Add to this its multiple heat settings and adjustable thermostat as well as the independent flame effect function, and you can see why this is a brilliant electric fire.
